name: Infini Cave (or the amazing adventure of a Spaceship in Mars)
name_original: Infini Cave (or the amazing adventure of a Spaceship in Mars)
description:
Explore procedurally generated caves with your trusty spaceship who is also a drilling machine! explore these neverending maps in 90's spaceship fashion.

The main objective is to get from your starting platform on the left and land on the right platform, you can mine ore to add score and get amunition for your cannon, what would you decide? strategically drill your way to the left or cannonball that wall of rocks? it's up to you! 

How far can you go? How much ore can you dig? Share a screenshot with the hashtag #InfiniCaveGame :)

Controls

NameDescriptionMoveArrow Keys or WASDAim cannonMouseFire cannonRight clickUse Super DrillDown arrow (while touching the ground)

Prototype made in three weeks, this is my first procedurally generated game and an ongoing project. I'll be adding more mechanics to the game and most certainly change the graphics as well as the sounds to a more fitting and unique style.

Want a goat in the game? it can be done. Don't be shy and share your ideas in the comments :)

All music and sound effects are Public Domain CC0:
